A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Great! The best star wars films since Empire! Kylo Ren is a FANTASTIC villain\, Rey once again shines and this is the most complex we've seen Luke. Mark Hamill gives a tremendous performance\, his best of the series. the action scenes are also the best of the series. The music is once again great\, and the film is visaully beautiful. This film is very unpredictable\, for the first time in Star Wars since 1983. Overall\, it's a great film and a worthy addition to teh Star Wars mythos
